tool.name: IgnoreResidues
tool.description: : Class to ignore residues in CMIP potential calculations.

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: residue_list
param.label: residue_list
param.help: Residue list in the format "Chain:Resnum" (no spaces between the elements) separated by commas. If no chain is provided all the residues in the pdb file will be market. ie: "A:3".

param.name: ignore_all
param.label: ignore_all
param.help: Mark all the residues in the PDB file.
